data.text: I cry out to God;
Whenever have trouble, I pray to the Lord;
When I think about God, I ◄despair/think that he will never help me►;
All during the night he prevents me from sleeping;
I think about days that have passed;
I spend the whole night thinking about things;
“Will the Lord always reject us?
Has he stopped faithfully loving us?
God promised to be merciful to us; has he forgotten that?
Then I said, “What causes me to be very sad is that
But then, Yahweh, I recall/remember your great deeds;
I meditate on all that you have done,
God, everything that you do is holy;
You are God, the one who performs miracles;
By your power [MTY] you rescued your people from Egypt;
It was as though the waters of the Red Sea saw you and became very afraid,
Rain poured down from the clouds [PRS];
Thunder crashed in the whirlwind,
Then you walked through the sea
You led your people like a shepherd leads his flock of sheep,
